thoughtText: Create an optimized pathfinding system for non-player characters (NPCs) to navigate the game world efficiently.
Reach the rank of Lord for Spider-Man in Marvel Rivals.
Debug the collision detection algorithm to ensure characters don't walk through walls..
Implement a new game mechanic that allows players to craft items using resources gathered throughout the game.
Develop a user-friendly interface for the game's inventory management system.
Optimize the rendering process to improve frame rates and reduce lag during gameplay.
Write unit tests for the new features added in the latest game update to ensure they function as intended.
Integrate online multiplayer functionality, including matchmaking and server management.
Design and implement a save system that allows players to save and load their progress seamlessly.
Create a dynamic audio system that adjusts background music and sound effects based on in-game events and player actions.
